name: smart-text-to-plain-text-converter
title: Smart Text to Plain Text Converter
description: Easily convert smart quotes, em dashes, and en dashes into plain text characters directly in Raycast. Simplify your text by replacing curly quotes and special characters with standard ones for better compatibility and cleaner formatting. Perfect for writers, developers, and anyone working with copied text.
author: karbassi

commands.name: convert-smart-text-to-plain-text
commands.title: Convert Smart Text to Plain Text
commands.subtitle: Replace Smart Quotes and Dashes with Plain Text
commands.description: Converts smart quotes, em dashes, and en dashes into plain text characters.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
